properties.entry: SELECT P_NO , P_TITLE , ADDRESS , P_CALL , P_SCORE , FILE_PATH || ORIGIN_NAME "TITLEIMG" FROM PLACE LEFT JOIN ATTECHMENT ON (P_NO = PLACE_NO) WHERE P_SELECT_NUM = 2 AND FILE_LEVEL = 1 AND P_STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT P_NO , P_TITLE , ADDRESS , P_CALL , P_SCORE , BUSINESSTIME , TEM_CATE_NO FROM PLACE WHERE P_STATUS = 'Y' AND P_NO = ?
SELECT FILE_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH FROM ATTECHMENT WHERE PLACE_NO = ?
SELECT P_NO , P_TITLE , FILE_PATH || ORIGIN_NAME "TITLEIMG" FROM PLACE LEFT JOIN ATTECHMENT ON (PLACE_NO = P_NO) WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND TEM_CATE_NO = ? AND P_NO != ?
